title: Hail Fire
description: Does she live?​Wouldn’t you like to know?​Prepare yourself for a pivotal book in the Hail saga that includes new DARPA drones, technological advancements the president insists on having included in the new mission. Two members from different agencies are captured and held for ransom. Who will risk their lives to save them? Is Hail’s team back together or forever shattered by recent tragic events? Your Starship awaits, so climb aboard, buckle-up tight, and get ready to blast off into another wild Hail adventure.
author: Brett Arquette
